description.li: This is the screen for creating new brand.
There are three input fields and all fields are mandatory.
The back key is used to go back to main screen.

function.li: Fill data for brand name, brand price and brand code.
Click “Create Brand” to create new one.
The new brand is created and shown in brand list.

description.li: This is the screen for creating new brand.
There are three input fields and all fields are mandatory.
The back key is used to go back to main screen.

function.li: Modify the desired fields with new data.
Click “Update Brand” to update the brand data.
The selected brand is modified with new input data and shown in brand list.
When back button is clicked, the application go back to brand list.

page.title: Create New Outlet/ Modify Existing Outlet

description.li: This is the screen for creating new shop.
The fields with * are mandatory and other are optional.
Outlet image can be set choosing from image gallery or taking new photo if desired.
The back key is used to go back to main screen.

function.li: Fill all mandatory fields.
Click “Create Shop” to create new one.
The new outlet is created and shown in outlet list.

description.li: This is the screen for creating outlet purchase transition.
This include three disable fields that are autocompleted by the application.
The other active fields are needed to enter the data by user.

instruction.li: Home => Outlet Records => Select outlet name => “+” Icon => “+” Icon => Select brand name => Click the brand name’s row

function.li: Fill the required field data
Click “Update” to record the purchase data.
Click “Update” to record the purchase data.
Click YES to confirm or NO to cancel.
After confirmation the data is recorded and shown in specific brand name row.

description.li: This is the screen for updating and deleting outlet record.
Can modify the existing data or delete the record.

instruction.li: Home => Outlet Records => Select outlet name => Select outlet record by date => Click the brand name’s row

function.li: Click the update button to modify the record data.
Click the delete icon on the top right corner of the screen.
After modification the existing record are shown in outlet record list.

description.li: This is the screen for exporting record data.
The record data can be exported by date range or shop name in two ways.

function.li: Choose date range option to export the date according to the specified start date and end date.
Choose shop name option to export the data according to the shop name.

description.li: This is the screen for exporting record data.
The record data can be exported by date range or shop name in two ways.

function.li: Choose date range option to export the date according to the specified start date and end date.
Choose shop name option to export the data according to the shop name.
